message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Why did you vote NO? Brief reason please">
ALL TEAM MEMBERS:

Follow-up: you all voted NO on "does this work need an introduction from others?" Please give your reason in 1-2 sentences. Why doesn't it need one?
</teammate-message>

input.content: The collection is architected to produce understanding through experience — that's the entire point of the Fish/Fishing structure. An external introduction that explains the work's significance before the reader has undergone the experiential sequences would undermine the very method the collection enacts: it would give the reader a framework before the phenomena, which is precisely the pre-metaphysical move the author spends seven essays dismantling.
input.summary: External intro would undermine the Fish-before-Fishing design

routing.summary: External intro would undermine the Fish-before-Fishing design

content.text: Waiting for the team lead's next message or assignment. The Foreword vote discussion appears to be wrapping up — all members voted NO on the work needing an external introduction, and reasons have been submitted.
